xml.p: The episode starts off with Michael accompanied by Fiona at a hotel pool, looking for Gilroy. After walking around Gilroy reveals himself as a man very interested in Michael. He mentions Strickler was an associate of his and asks why Michael shot him. Michael lies, claiming he just wanted to eliminate the middleman instead of what he really wanted; to save Fiona. Gilroy also reveals he arranged Diego's death, and he is hesitant to trust Michael. Finally, he wants to know all about Michael and his "little girlfriend", having his man shoot near her.

Michael goes back to Maddy's house, explaining to Sam what happened and that he needs to earn Gilroy's trust. Unexpectedly, an old friend of Sam's named Mack shows up and is greeted with 2 punches by Sam, though says he deserved them both. Sam explains they served together on the SEALs but does not explain what caused the problem between them. Eventually he calms down and agrees to have a beer with Mack.
